**Example**

```esql
FROM employees
| EVAL cs1 = COPY_SIGN(salary, LEAST(salary_change))
```

| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 10001 | 57305 | 1.19 | 57305 |
| 10002 | 56371 | [-7.23, 11.17] | -56371 |
| 10003 | 61805 | [12.82, 14.68] | 61805 |
